channel.title: KevinCTofel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KevinCTofel.

item.description: Well that’s odd. The Tesla we ordered was just delivered as an NFT in a Twitter DM. And it’s valued in DOGE. What’s going on?!? https://t.co/U1cLX1mW7P
How to search for saved passwords on a Chromebook https://t.co/LlLgMCxeeZ
As Google continues to break apart Chrome OS from the Chrome browser, some features may get moved. Viewing saved passwords is one of them. https://t.co/LlLgMCxeeZ
Last day of this sale (until next time). HP Chromebook x2 11 is discounted to half-price: $299 for a Chrome OS tablet (Updated) https://t.co/Pan7qpx0GR
@mrjlturn3r Sure. If we (collectively) are going to discuss sensitive topics we’re passionate about, we have to first listen. And keep it from being an absolute and “me vs you” topic. Cheers!

@mrjlturn3r @BrianSimsPA @JoshShapiroPA Appreciate &respect your position. To clarify, murder is the unlawful killing of another human without justification or valid excuse, especially the unlawful killing of another human with malice aforethought. Repro rights in this respect is a woman’s right to choose.

I just sent the free, weekly About Chromebooks newsletter out for a Sunday afternoon read. Want in on this every weekend? Just click the link to see the latest issue and sign up! https://t.co/PuYaioz4S7
Wordle 308 4/6 Took me a while to get this one! ⬛🟨⬛⬛⬛ ⬛🟨⬛🟨⬛ ⬛⬛🟩🟨🟩 🟩🟩🟩🟩🟩
New Chromebook user? Learn to use Chrome OS with this simulator https://t.co/jBiapinTY2
Did you know that you can quickly learn to use Chrome OS with just a web browser? This simulator is right up your alley if you’re a new Chromebook user. https://t.co/jBiapinTY2
@chrisnickinson Same here. I was making a bad joke about trying to opt of the virus, not the checkups. 🤪
@chrisnickinson I got that text a few times. I thought I could reply STOP to opt out of COVID. Apparently it doesn’t work that way. 🤷🏼‍♂️
This. 👇🏼 https://t.co/C0bRXkylos
@royd77 If budget allows, I’d hold off. I think the Duet hardware is a bit better. Just keep in mind that it starts at $399, so extra memory or storage over the base model will add up.
This deal is back through Sunday. HP Chromebook x2 11 is discounted to half-price: $299 for a Chrome OS tablet (Updated) https://t.co/Pan7qpx0GR

@boundzy98 This was a TON of fun, so thanks for playing! Super competitive the entire 18 “holes” and more enjoyable than a daily challenge IMO. Plus it’s given me the idea for a small coding project to work on. 😉
Wordle 307 3/6 Birdie (-1) on the final hole! -6 for this round of Wordle Golf. ⛳️ ⬛⬛🟩⬛🟩 ⬛🟩🟩⬛🟩 🟩🟩🟩🟩🟩
ICYMI: Zoom PWA for Chromebook gains blur and virtual backgrounds https://t.co/C72wVnFjvU
@boundzy98 It’s definitely possible! Who would have thought after nearly a “full round” it would be this close!

@Gartenberg All good points, thanks! I think there's demand because we "olds" haven't collectively transitioned to this abstracted approach. I've asked my kids and their friends about this and they look at me like I'm Henry Ford, saying "What do we need that for?" 🤣
The @Zoom PWA gained a new trick on Chrome OS that brings it closer to a full desktop experience: Blur and virtual backgrounds are here. https://t.co/C72wVnFjvU
Wordle 306 3/6 Birdie (-1)! -5 through 17. Final hole tomorrow! ⬛⬛🟨🟨🟨 ⬛🟨🟩🟩⬛ 🟩🟩🟩🟩🟩
After much neglect, the Google Chrome Web Store gets some attention. Chromebook users should look for new badges in the store that devs can earn. https://t.co/1er6UxgJ9G
